title: A few T206's that I'm looking for - lower grade
author: Bostnfn

posts.post_title: A few T206's that I'm looking for - lower grade
posts.post_content:
Hi, I'm looking for ungraded copies of the following players. Generally lower grade is ok such as small creases. Not in a rush to buy but thought I'd but it out there.
Charlie Hemphill, Tommy Leach, Jack Quinn, Kaiser Wilhelm, Ginger Beaumont, Fred Tenney, Hal Chase, Deacon Phillippe, Fred Merkle, George Stone
